item.title: Kanban
item.description: The Kanban method is a workflow/process system. Kanban principles & practices Principles Change management principles Start with what you do now Agree to pursue incremental, evolutionary change Encourage acts of leadership at all levels Service delivery principles Focus on customer’s needs and expectations Manage the work Regularly review the network of services Practices Visualize the workflow Limit Work In Progress (WIP) Manage flow, not people Make process policies explicit Feedback loops Improve collaboratively Basic Kanban rules Visualize work Track status of items Limit WIP (Work In Progress) Pull, not push Make process rules explicit Personal Kanban Without a team, a lot of the principles make no sense or are not needed.
